backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a study tracker backend with subject/chapter management and study target CRUD operations, including query functions for retrieving subjects and targets by date or range.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two dashboard/CSS fix features to their affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of each frontend source file, describing their roles in the study tracker app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom property color tokens (stored as raw channel values) for light and dark modes, plus base border and body styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript entry point as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with routes for Dashboard, Subjects, Create Target, and Calendar pages, wrapped in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Shared layout component rendering a sticky header with navigation links, a main content area, and a footer with attribution.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom hook and context provider managing Internet Identity authentication state, exposing login/logout functions and status flags via an AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating subjects, chapters, and study targets via the backend actor, including queries for date ranges and mutations that invalidate relevant caches.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines a warm academic OKLCH color palette with CSS custom properties for both light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CalendarPage.tsx: Calendar page component that displays a monthly grid of study targets fetched by date range, allowing users to navigate months and view per-day target details and progress.
frontend/src/pages/CreateTargetPage.tsx: Page for creating a new study target by selecting a date and toggling chapters from available subjects, then submitting the selection to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page showing today's study target with chapter completion checkboxes and progress, or a prompt to create a target if none exists.
frontend/src/pages/SubjectsPage.tsx: Subjects management page that lists all subjects with their chapters and progress, and provides dialogs for adding new subjects and chapters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, content paths, custom OKLCH-based color tokens, typography, border radius, box shadows, and keyframe animations, with plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks project state at version 3, recording a known dashboard display bug persisting after deployment and two existing fix features targeting dashboard rendering and OKLCH CSS/Tailwind color token correctness.
